name: Movylo

overview:
Movylo.com is a mobile CMS that lets you create your personal or corporate mobile site in a few clicks. With Movylo.com you can:

  • Create your mobile site, personal or business and publish it for all mobile terminals and customize it as you want!
  • Load and manage your multimedia content (ringtones, video, wallpapers, games…);
  • Build and maintain your own blog or business;
  • Mobilize your existing blog;
  • Send your newsletters both via email and SMS;
  • Make questionnaires and polls to gather votes and research market in real time;
  • Create real time contests (send an SMS and say “click here to find out if you win …”);
  • Analyze the statistics in real time to see how your users navigate your mobile site
